wordGroup: mental retardation 智力迟钝；智能缺陷（等于mental deficiency）
growth retardation 生长迟缓；生长阻滞

sentences.en: Many factors can lead to growth retardation in unborn babies.
sentences.cn: 许多因素可以导致胎儿发育迟缓。

sentences.en: Acute exposure to lead may impact mice behavior altering such as irritability, hyperkinesis, retardation of learning and memory, etc.
sentences.cn: 急性铅暴露可能影响小鼠的行为改变，如易怒、运动亢进、学习和记忆迟钝等。

sentences.en: Studies show that iodine deficiency is the leading preventable cause of mental retardation.
sentences.cn: 研究显示，缺碘是智力发育迟缓的一个主要但可预防的因素。
